name: Expense Tracker
description:
Expense Tracking mobile app created with flutter, uses realmDB with atlas device sync to sync users data to a mongoDB cluster on the cloud.
The application leverages the power of Machine Learning to help classify each transaction before adding it, and also provides monthly spending forecast.

name: Multi-Tier Architecture
description: This Terraform configuration sets up a scalable, resilient AWS infrastructure for a full-stack web app, featuring a VPC, EC2 instances, ASGs, ALBs, Route53 for DNS, ACM for SSL/TLS, RDS for databases, IAM roles for permissions, SSM for securing database credentials, and CloudWatch for monitoring.

name: S3 Static Website
description: This Terraform configuration defines AWS infrastructure for hosting a static website, including an S3 bucket for assets, CloudFront for content delivery, ACM for TLS certificates, Route 53 for DNS, and a CodeBuild project for automated deployment. This setup ensures secure, efficient hosting and automated DNS management.

name: Serverless Email Reminder
description: This Terraform configuration sets up a serverless reminder system on AWS, using SES for email, Lambda for logic, and Step Functions via API Gateway. The frontend is hosted on S3 with CloudFront, Route 53 manages DNS, and ACM provides SSL/TLS. IAM roles manage permissions, and CloudWatch handles logging.

name: ClusterDeploy
description: ClusterDeploy is a comprehensive project designed to showcase Kubernetes environment using K3s, a lightweight Kubernetes distribution. This project integrates various components essential for modern cloud-native applications, including ArgoCD for GitOps, Prometheus for monitoring, Grafana for visualization, Traefik Proxy as the Ingress controller, and Kubeseal for secure secret management.

name: K8sProvisioner
description: A streamlined Kubernetes provisioner that uses Vagrant to quickly spin up three VirtualBox VMs, automatically setting up a Kubernetes cluster with either K3s for lightweight deployments or Kubeadm for standard clusters.
